name: Paws & Claws Pampered Pets Resort 3D
description:
Nurture and love the animals to grow your pet care business and become every animal's best friend! Be an entrepreneur!

Features

• Use profits from your resort to grow your business.
• Lots of fun mini-games including shopping, pedicures, fitness.
• Vaccinate your pets at the clinic.
• Spoil your pets with relaxing spa treatments like acupuncture, aroma therapy, & massage
